Name: Ethan
Text: So what was the operation again?

Name: Robin
Text: We need to go to the base and extract the materials in order to export it back to America

Name: Ethan
Text: That's a very dangerous plan, do we have backup?

Name: Robin
Text: Yes, Private [You] will cover us, any suggestions Private?

Name: You
Text: No, just follow the orders given and this will be smooth like butter

Name: Robin
Text: Good then we are ready for the day!
